column1: short of a length on leg stump, flicked straight to short fine
length ball with late swing away in the channel. Defended off the back foot
full and just outside off. Looks to drive through cover, thick inside edge to mid-on
length ball shaping away outside off, gets on top of the line and punches on the up between cover and extra
full and in at leg stump, defended to mid-on off the front foot
length outside off, mistimed drive on the up, straight to extra cover
short of a length and pushed across the corridor, looks to chop to third man, beaten on the outside edge
short of a length just outside off, looks to pull, gets an under edge into midwicket
length at off stump, defended into the covers on the front foot. Steal a single and they don't take the overthrows at midwicket as the throw is deflected off the batsman
short of a length wide outside off. Looks to slap this with a flat bat through the off side. Beaten by pace. It hurries onto him and he ends up chipping to mid-off
short and just outside off. Defended to point's left off the back foot
short and just outside off. Pulled along the turf to deep square
short of a length outside off, chopped to cover point on the up
length outside off, punched on the up to cover
length at middle stump, steps out and slices it over mid-off on the up. Didn't seemed to have connected too well on that, but he's got enough
full and in at leg stump, punched to mid-on with the angle
length ball wide outside off, punched to sweeper's right
short of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
length and wide outside off, slashes on the rise and is beaten on the outside edge
full and in at leg stump, flicked with the angle to midwicket
full and shaping away late just outside off. Stays leg side of it and looks to carve it through cover. Beaten on the outside edge

length at off stump, defended off the thick outside edge. Point leaps to his right and puts in a reverse flick along the floor as the batsmen have a mix-up. Couldn't swivel in time to throw with his left hand
short of a length just outside off, hurriedly defended to backward point
short of a length outside off, dabbed to third man off the outside half
length and sliding in at leg stump. Leans in and flicks on the up to long-on

deep square doesn't get there. He's lost it in the sky. Length ball pushed across off stump. Looks to play the slog sweep, slices it up and Jewell loses it in the sun and just ends up running the wrong line
full and just outside off, holds his shape and chips this straight over mid-off
length at middle stump, swept on the rise to deep square's left
length and down leg. Looks to sweep and is beaten. Big appeal from Wade is met with a wide call
short of a length on middle stump, tapped to midwicket's left
short of a length outside off, chopped to point's left, can't beat his dive
short of a length and pushed across off stump, looks for the pull, slices it harmlessly to mid-on's right
short of a length on leg stump, whipped to short fine's left off the back foot
yorker at middle stump, opens his stance and looks to drive through the off side. Can only jam it into the pitch
full at off stump, makes room, stands tall and opens the face late to drive this to the cover boundary
short of a length on leg stump, backs away and stabs away from the body. Thick inside edge through square leg
length outside off, tapped on the up to point
length at middle stump, flicked with soft hands into the open midwicket region to steal two from long-on
length at middle stump, gets down for the paddle sweep, top edge to short fine's left
length at off stump, punched to extra cover on the up
full and in at leg stump, hurried swipe to deep midwicket
full and just outside off. Steps out and jams it down the pitch. Can't beat the bowler's dive to his right
length at leg stump, flicked to short fine's right
length and just outside off. Defended to point with an open face
short of a length just outside off, backs away and dabs to third man
short of a length just outside off, dropped into the covers with soft hands
short and slanted in at leg stump. Backs away and looks to play the upper cut. Beaten
slower ball, full and down leg side. Beaten on the flick
finds deepsquare. Short and rising up outside off. Hooks from under it, ends up slicing without control. McDermott sprints to his left and keeps his eyes on it as he pouches that
full and in at off stump. Looks to flick gets an inside edge onto pad that trickles into the square leg region
length outside off, leans in and pokes to sweeper cover
short of a length just outside off, punched to extra cover off the back foot
length at middle stump, tapped into the midwicket area with soft hands
length outside off, punched on the up to long-off's right
length outside off, defended to backward point, away from the body
length and in at off stump. Tapped on the up to the bowler
short of a length at middle stump, clipped to deep midwicket off the back foot

holes out to long-on. Slower ball lobbed up at a length outside off. Carey looks to pump him over midwicket with a slog but ends up hitting it high and not long. Botha pedals to his left and holds close to the body
length at leg stump, flicked to deep square's right
length and in at leg stump. Looks to flick, cops it on the pad
short and wide outside off, makes room, gets his weight into this by stepping out and blazes this cut to sweeper's left
yorker length outside off. Looks to jam it through cover. Looks like a bump ball through to Wade whose appeal is turned down
short and outside off, cut straight to sweeper
tossed up at middle stump, flicked to long-on's right
length at off stump, spins away as he looks to punch straight. Thick outside edge to short third
length outside off. Shuffles, gets low, and ramps this to the keeper's left. Short fine cleans up
length outside off, hurriedly punched on the up to long-off
googly, short of a length on leg stump. Tapped through square leg off the back foot
short and in at middle stump. Backs away and pulls straight to deep midwicket
clears midwicket comfortably. Short and in at middle stump. Gets deep in the crease and uses the pace and angle into him to pull this far behind the boundary
short and wide outside off, uppish cut to sweeper's left
length outside off, chopped to sweeper cover
length and pushed flat outside off. Opens the face and runs it to short third man's left
drilled to sweeper's right! Full ball floating away outside off. Gets to the pitch and drives firmly, giving the fielder no chance
full and floated up at middle stump. Gets low and controls the sweep to get this fine of deep square
short of a length outside off, cut to sweeper
full slider across off stump. Wants to sweep that, but it is past his bat quickly
googly, short of a length outside off. Mistimed pull to deep midwicket
length ball sliding outside off, mistimed drive on the rise to long-off's right
full outside off, driven to sweeper's left
full and in at off stump, gets the front leg out of the way and is late on the drive. Perhaps intentionally so. It runs wide of backward point and into the boundary
yorker, just outside off. Jams through cover
short of a length just outside off, crouches and jabs at it away from the body. Beaten
length at off stump, slices on the up to point's right. He misfields
yorker at off stump, pokes it out into the covers
short of a length at leg stump, swivels and pulls. Lands short of deep midwicket
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper's left
length at off stump, backs away and slices straight to point
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper's left
short of a length on leg stump. Steps out and is beaten in flight. Swats at it and lobs it to short fine's right
low full toss outside off, shuffles and sweeps. Struck on the full on his pad, but he's outside the line
slow loopy length ball wide outside off. Looks to drive on the rise, under-edge into the covers
length at off stump, backs away and slices to third man
yorker outside off, jams underneath this as he looks to find the point boundary
great connection! Bouncer at leg stump. Deep in the crease, a short step into the off side and a hook that goes a long way over fine leg
yorker, wide outside off. Shuffles and looks to drill through point again. Beaten
full toss outside off, shuffles and wants to pull. It's too quick. Ends up slicing to long-off
length at leg stump, pushed to square leg's left
short and angled in from outside off. Walks down and cuts at it. Beaten
slower ball, full and very wide. Outside the pitch almost. Left alone
full and curving away wide outside off. Shuffles a long way and looks to drive. Beaten
full toss wide outside off. Left alone. No shuffles this time
length outside off, punched firmly to extra cover where Clive Rose picks up and throws quickly. Doesn't get the stumps at the non-striker's end. Narrowly. Would have been out
slower ball, back of a length outside off. Beaten on the cut. Wade gets a deflection to short third's left as this falls short of him and turns
length and wide outside off, sliced to sweeper point's left
taken at long-off. Full and wide outside off. Shuffles and looks to slug it over midwicket. Gets it off the low part of the bat and it's high and to long-off's right
low full toss just outside off, hurried tap through cover
full and in at the stumps. Swiped wide of deep midwicket's. A no-ball too. Free hit coming up
short of a length just outside off. Shuffles and looks to pull. It's too quick for him. Slices it to long-on
full toss at off stump, looks to slog and slices it high towards long-on. It drops short of the fielder running in
yorker at off stump, backs away and slices to sweeper cover
taken at deep point. Length outside off, steps out and slashes at it. Slices it high and there's a fumble there but he holds on
length and in at the stumps, shoveled towards deep square
too full, ends up as a low full toss on the pads and he's flicked that away effortlessly to the deep square leg fence. Incredible power in those forearms
same ball, same length - but he goes over extra cover this time. Takes it inside out and clears the in-field to raise his fifty

this time the length is almost a yorker on leg stump, but he doesn't get it right. marginally so, but Ingram is good enough to go inside out again. Better timed than the last ball and goes to the extra cover fence again
shortens his length, short ball on leg stump. Ingram moves across to paddle it over the keeper but doesn't connect
top edge over the keeper another short ball, targeted at the head, Ingram goes for a full-blooded pull but gets a top edge that flies straight over the keeper's head. Can't set a field to that
wham goes full again, and on leg stump. He smokes it over extra cover with superb timing, carries all the way
length at middle stump, backs away and looks to slog through midwicket. Gets it off the under-edge to the bowler's right. He swivels to throw and misses at the non-stirker's end
yorker, wide outside off, jammed off the toe-end to long-on's right

full and in at middle stump. Looks to slog that, gets an inside edge onto pad and into the square leg region. Or not. Leg bye says the umpire, in which case that looked really good for lbw. It hit him on the full in front of leg stump
yorker at leg stump, steps out and jabs it towards long-on
short of a length on off stump, backs away and cuts to point
low full toss wide outside off. Shuffles and looks to slog over midwicket, ends up slicing it feebly towards long-on
length and shaping in at middle stump. Shuffles and jabs it through midwicket with the angle
short of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
short and up at off stump. Poked into the leg side off the back foot
length ball just outside off, defended down the pitch off the back foot
short of a length just outside off, mistimed pull through midwicket
length and outside off. Pushes at it away from the body, gets it off the inside half to mid-on's left
short of a length and sliding across off stump. Chopped into the point region
short of a length and down leg side. Beaten as he looks to glance
googly, short of a length outside off, on the back foot to punch to long-on
short at middle stump, waits on it to arrive and swipes it behind square on the leg side. No one deep there
length at middle stump, thick inside edge to deep square as he pushes on the front foot
full at middle stump, driven back to the bowler on the bounce
dropped short at a leg stump line, pulled to deep square
in the mid-riff. Collective oooffff from the crowd. Short of a length and rising up the thigh. Pings onto the box after brushing the thigh guard and floors him. He was looking to leap and glance that
length at off stump, defended to cover off the back foot
bouncer at a leg stump line, drops the shoulder and lets it pass
length ball pushed across off stump. Stuck on the back foot, doesn't move his feet at all. Swishes away from the body and gets it wide of mid-off off the toe-end
length at middle stump, defended to backward point
short and just outside off, defended to point off the back foot
length and turning away outside off. Closes the face on this and can't get it past the bowler off the back foot
length and pushed across off. On the back foot to flick into the leg side
length at leg stump, flicked to deep square
length outside off, onto the back foot to push back to the bowler
short and skidding at middle stump. Mistimed pull to deep midwicket
short of a length at leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
short of a length at off stump, backs away and guides this straight to point
leading edge and there's no one at third man. Length ball rising up at middle stump. Closes the face on it too early
short of a length on leg stump, dabbed through backward square leg off the back foot
short of a length on the pads, shuffles and tickles this fine of short fine leg
length outside off, defended from deep in the crease
length outside off, shuffles and looks to flick. Deflected into the off side off the thigh guard
overpitched outside off, driven straight to extra cover
overpitched on middle stump, picks the length early and gets the front leg out of the way. Slogs under it and sends it 81 metres in the square leg direction
full toss outside off, gets his weight into this and punches it wide of mid-off
full toss outside off, looks to punch wide of mid-off again. Can't bean extra cover's dive to the left
lands between mid-off and long-on. Slower length ball wide outside off. Looks to launch it over mid-off but is through the shot early. But he gets it wide enough to the right of long-on to survive
full and outside off. Stands tall and punches firmly to beat mid-off to his right
low full toss outside off, sliced to sweeper's right
yorker at off stump, jammed back to the bowler
full on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
short of a length on leg stump, dabbed through square leg off the back foot
short outside off, backs away and looks to pull. Beaten
yorker just outside off, looks to flick, gets an inside edge onto pad
short and wide outside off, waits and cuts late to sweeper's right
short at middle stump, pulled to deep square
full googly outside off, driven to long-off's left
googly at a length outside off. Shuffles and pokes to point's left
short of a length and in at leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket's left
short of a length and skidding in outside off. Dead-batted into the pitch off the back foot
short of a length at off stump, backs away and cuts to point's left
full outside off, shuffles and flicks
length outside off, driven to sweeper's right
pumped. That is struck hard. Lobbed up wide outside off and he gets a full stretch out and swing at this. Drilled straight through where the umpire's head was before he ducked
short of a length outside off, chopped to sweeper's right
length outside off, swept to deep square
overpitched outside off, plants the front leg out and slices it through point. Sweeper is too far away from that
full and just outside off. Driven straight to extra cover

misfield and pushed wide of the fielder backing him up. That's Rashid sprinting to his right at deep midwicket, who parries a flick into the boundary. That was full and flicked between deep midwicket and long-on
full on off stump, driven along the floor to long-off
low full toss on middle stump, flicked to deep square
low full toss on middle and leg stump. Gets on one knee and sweeps it high over deep square
full on middle stump, flicked to deep midwicket's left
full on leg stump, flicked to long-on
short of a length on leg stump, flicked to short fine
short of a length down leg side, whipped to short fine
length outside off, punched to long-off on the up
length outside off, gets forward and flicks through midwicket
overpitched wide outside off, gets on the front foot and slices to sweeper's right
full on middle stump, flicked to long-on
clears midwicket. Not connected too well, but his bat speed and Stanlake's bowling speed have done enough. Length at leg stump and he swung hard at this, across the line
yorker outside off, jammed to third man's left
full toss wide outside off, stands tall, opens the face, slices it to point's right
to deep midwicket's right now. Short ball at middle stump, gets deep in the crease and swings cleanly again
slower ball at a length wide outside off, swishes away from the body, gets it to sweeper's left
slower ball at a length outside off, driven to sweeper off the front foot
full outside off, driven past the bowler, down to long-off
short of a length offcutter, wide outside off. Watches it off the surface and stabs it past short third man with the turn
short of a length cutter outside off again. Dabbed to short third man's right
slower ball at a length wide outside off. Slashes at it and gets a thick edge down to third man
full toss, slower all and wide outside off. Reaches out and slices to third man
full outside off, driven to long-off
yorker at middle stump, looks to flick, gets it off the boot into the off side. Lbw appeal turned down
full at the stumps, flicked to deep midwicket

low outswinging full toss outside off. Slammed past the non-striker. Long-off gets across to his left and pulls it back in with a slide. It continues sliding towards the boundary with the momentum but long-on then tumbles to pull it back in again
full at leg stump, clipped to deep midwicket
length at leg stump, flicked to long-on
length ball follows him down leg side as he shuffles. Nudges it fine off the hips
length at leg stump, flicked to midwicket's left
full and angled in at leg stump. Looks to flick, deflected into the off side off the front pad
short of a length on leg stump, flicked to deep backward square
short and in at the body as he backs into the leg side. Cut straight to backward point
googly at a length, wide outside off. Beaten as he looks to sweep
full on leg stump, gets the front leg out and slogs this over the midwicket boundary to bring up is fifty
short at leg stump, backs away and pulls it over deep square this time
short and wide outside off, looks to cut, gets it to extra cover off the toe-end
short and wide outside off, gets on the back foot, stays leg side of it and cuts late. Too good for sweeper cover
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper
full and in at leg stump, drivne uppishly with the angle, past non-striker. Long-on slides to his right to keep it to two
length and in at leg stump, tapped to long-on off the front foot
length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
short and just outside off, backs away and cuts it firmly to extra cover's left
chips over long-onand that is the game! A ten wicket win, sealed by stepping out and chipping this length ball over the fielder
